𓄛 Tier deri deer 𓄜  

Example:  
    *𓍋[𓃀](𓃀)[𓏲](𓏲)[𓄛](𓄛)[𓏪](𓏪) L'Banther:  
    *𓍋𓃀𓏲𓃮 El Panther  
    *𓍋𓃀𓅱𓃰 El'Phanter

   leather, hide   𓄛  
deri@Turk

leather  
al deir = vom Tier  

   leather, hide    𓂧  𓁷  𓂋  𓇋  𓇋  
   leather, hide    𓂧  𓁷  𓂋  𓄛

deri@Turk  

   skin, water - skin   𓄞   𓂧  𓄛
